content.rendered:
Handshake has an ever-expanding suite of features that help schools nurture relationships with their employer partners. Join us to learn how your peers use Handshake for employer relations—both as a standalone customer relationship management (CRM) platform, and in conjunction with CRM platforms like Salesforce. We also discuss upcoming product updates that expand the ways you can build and track employer relationships in Handshake.

Featuring guest speakers Sean McGowan, Assistant Director for Employer Relations at Carnegie Mellon University and Nathan Hunsaker, Associate Director of Technology and Data at the University of Virginia.

Followup materials:

  • Who wins with virtual recruiting? report
  • Carnegie Mellon’s one-pager on using Handshake as a CRM
  • Scheduled reports help article
  • Alumni Hub help article
  • DEI report templates blog post

excerpt.rendered: Learn about strategies from your peers and product updates from Handshake to supercharge your team’s employer relations work.
